methods.buildDirective:
Builds the COLUMN_RENDERERS_ATTRIBUTE directive from the data in this ColumnRenderersBuilder.

:return: (java.lang.String) a String representing the COLUMN_RENDERERS_ATTRIBUTE directive
methods.fromDirective:
Creates a new ColumnRenderersBuilder from an existing COLUMN_RENDERERS_ATTRIBUTE directive.

:param directive: (java.lang.String) - a valid COLUMN_RENDERERS_ATTRIBUTE directive
:return: (io.deephaven.db.v2.ColumnRenderersBuilder) a ColumnRenderersBuilder represented by the directive
methods.get:
Gets a ColumnRenderersBuilder from the COLUMN_RENDERERS_ATTRIBUTE in a source Table.

:param source: (io.deephaven.db.tables.Table) - the Table
:return: (io.deephaven.db.v2.ColumnRenderersBuilder) the ColumnRenderersBuilder from the Table
methods.getColumnSet:
Returns a Set of column-names, which may be verified as valid prior to setting our directive as an attribute to
 the table

:return: (java.util.Set<java.lang.String>) An iterable Set of column-names identified by this builder-instance
methods.getRenderClassName:
Gets the fully qualified class name for the renderer of a column.

:param columnName: (java.lang.String) - the column name
:return: (java.lang.String) the fully qualified class name of the renderer
methods.getRendererType:
Gets the column renderer type assigned to a given column name.  Returns null if none is assigned.

:param columnName: (java.lang.String) - the name of the column
:return: (io.deephaven.db.v2.ColumnRenderersBuilder.ColumnRendererType) the renderer type, null if none is assigned
methods.isColumnRendererSet:
Indicates if a specific column has a renderer set in the builder.

:param columnName: (java.lang.String) - the name of the column to check
:return: (boolean) true if it is set, false otherwise
methods.isEmpty:
Identifies if this builder-instance contains any renderer-definitions. If not, then the calling method should
 not attempt to add our directive an an attribute to a table

:return: (boolean) true if there are no renderers defined, else false
methods.removeRenderer:
Removes the renderer for a column of a given name.

:param columnName: (java.lang.String) - the name of the column
:return: io.deephaven.db.v2.ColumnRenderersBuilder
methods.setDefaultRenderClass:
Sets the default class name to use for the default render type.

:param className: (java.lang.String) - the fully qualified class name of the column renderer
:return: io.deephaven.db.v2.ColumnRenderersBuilder
methods.setRenderClass:
Sets the class name associated with a given render type.

:param renderType: (io.deephaven.db.v2.ColumnRenderersBuilder.ColumnRendererType) - the render type to set
:param className: (java.lang.String) - the fully qualified class name of the column renderer
:return: io.deephaven.db.v2.ColumnRenderersBuilder
methods.setRenderer:
Sets a column renderer for a column of a given name.

*Overload 1*  
  :param columnName: java.lang.String
  :param rendererName: java.lang.String
  :return: io.deephaven.db.v2.ColumnRenderersBuilder
  
*Overload 2*  
  :param columnName: (java.lang.String) - the name of the column
  :param rendererType: (io.deephaven.db.v2.ColumnRenderersBuilder.ColumnRendererType) - the type of renderer
  :return: io.deephaven.db.v2.ColumnRenderersBuilder
  
*Overload 3*  
  :param columnName: java.lang.String
  :param rendererClass: java.lang.Class<? extendsjavax.swing.table.TableCellRenderer>
  :return: io.deephaven.db.v2.ColumnRenderersBuilder

text: Builds and parses the directive for Table.COLUMN_RENDERERS_ATTRIBUTE.
